summary: Replaces the model of Daedric Helmet by that of the Gold and Ruby Circlet, keeping stats and armor type as is.
descriptionHtml:
[b]=== Description ===[/b]
This mod changes the model of the [b]Daedric Helmet[/b] by that of the [b]Gold and Ruby Circlet[/b], much like the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1839]Morokei Circlet mod by kab[/url]. Current stats (including armor, enchantment and workbench improvement) are kept, as well as the armor type (Heavy Armor).

[b]=== Installation ===[/b]
Extract the contents of the zip file to your Skyrim installation folder.
Start Skyrim using the launcher and click on [b]DATA FILES*[/b] and enable the [b]DaedricCirclet.esp[/b] before clicking [b]PLAY[/b].

* to enable the data files option in the launcher check [url=http://answers.yahoo.com/question/index?qid=20111119180622AAzkDCS]this link[/url]
author: wvh
